credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
title: Proposed Design for the West Wall of the Music Room
description:
Horizontal rectangle. Design for the Royal Pavilion, Brighton. Elevation of the west wall, with two large painted panels of Chinese lions flanking the fireplace. The panels are, in turn, flanked by columns entwined by serpents. Other detail and section of wall are sketched in or indicated by outline, in pencil.

Original album associated with this collection still exists.  See 1948-40-1 accessory
name: Drawing
